title: Lubalin of today?
content:
Wondering if anyone could recommend an production oriented illustrator/typographer of Tony DiSpigna or Tom Carnase quality...  
(Or any designer doing similiar stuff as they did for Herb Lubalin)

Cheers!
author: mlvr

comments.content:
The lads at UpNorth seem to be heavily influenced by that era of typography and illustration:

[http://www.discover-upnorth.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419112815/http:/www.discover-upnorth.com/ "http://www.discover-upnorth.com/")
I would check out some of Alejandro Paul's work. Tony's work is amazing. As one of his former students, I owe a lot of my artistic growth to him.
